Title: As You Like It
Director: J. Stuart Blackton, Charles Kent, James Young
Actors: Maurice Costello, Rose Coghlan, Rosemary Theby
Plot: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.
